categories: Category:Commerce and labor guilds and unions

nodes.text: The Intracluster Gatherers were a guild that operated during the war between the First Order and the Resistance, formed from a splinter of the Wandering Star criminal syndicate. The Intracluster Gatherers were one of the most influential guilds in the Thieves' Quarter of Kijimi City, located on the planet Kijimi. When Poe Dameron arrived back on Kijimi with his Resistance teammates, he speculated that the gang had taken over the area near his old spicerunners area, as the sewer was backed up and the Intracluster Gatherers notoriously skimped on utility upkeep.
The Intracluster Gatherers are mentioned in material for the 2019 saga film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker.
